This game is, as the title suggests, a sim for ... the holiday simmer.

This ressembles a kinda "Leave my life in the cockpit", and fly the airplane around, but no complicated procedures to follow

The career mode starts by introducing flying an airplane manually, through 10 tutorials about different stages of flight, before entering full flights career, and winning most achievements

All in all, that's a correct distracting game, so positive feedback, good for distress, a bit of immersion at airports, but can be very repetitive if played too much, especially in career mode.
